function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in the number of individuals contracting COVID-19 and being exposed to SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"High potential for disease spread and transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control mechanisms and social-distancing measures","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, hygiene protocols, and ventilation strategies","People":"Building occupants, administrators, public officials","Owner":"Building owners, corporate entities, governmental bodies"},{"Description":"Limited effectiveness of filtration techniques against pathogens such as SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Reduced ability to remove microbes and particles that contribute to disease transmission","Mitigation":"Upgrade filtration systems to MERV-13 or higher, utilize HEPA filters, and enhance ventilation strategies","Technologies":"HEPA filters, MERV-13 filters, advanced ventilation systems","People":"Healthcare facilities, building owners, administrators","Owner":"Building owners, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Changes required after original publication","Impact":"Potential for misinformation and confusion","Mitigation":"Ensure accurate and timely updates to published information, and transparent communication of changes","Technologies":"Publication management and communication tools","People":"Readers, administrators, decision-makers","Owner":"Researchers, publishers, administrators"}]}
